title: fix match making
body: do something about the trolls, whats the point of playing ranked when theres one idiot to ruin the game, thats all it takes and its ranked seriously i thought ranked would have people with half a brain but its not like that you get less trolls and afkers in normals, no other game has this much trolls, runescape community is what i thought the worst community in gaming, but now lol just skyrocketed and topped it off

replies.body: Making multiple threads about what is essentially the same thing won't get it more noticed, or get it solved quicker.
